name: explicitness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being clear and exact: The story was told with the explicitness of a textbook. The skilled negotiator knows that explicitness aids common understanding.
the act of showing or talking about sex or violence in a very detailed way: The discussion was about the explicitness of sex on the screen. Their letters had an emotional intensity and a sensual explicitness. See
explicit
More examplesFewer examplesThe explicitness of the instructions left no room for doubt.They called for more explicitness in warning of the risks of tuberculosis infection.The obscenity and indecency laws are generally directed against sexual explicitness.She objected to the explicitness of some of the sex scenes.
